data.title: George Usher (1808-abt.1891)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for George Usher born 1808 Hull, Yorkshire, England died 1891 North Cave Drewton and Everthorp, Yorkshire, England including ancestors + descendants + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 20 Jan 2024 | Created 15 Jun 2021

This page has been accessed 157 times.

Biography

George Usher was born in Yorkshire, England.

Christening Date 4 Sep 1808 Saint Mary, Kingston Upon Hull[1]

Marriage 13 DEC 1830. Hessle By Hull, York, England. Wife Hannah Hannal. (AKA Hannah Hannal/Arnill/Arnold)

George Arnold Usher.

Elizabeth Usher.

Emma Usher.

Mary Jane Usher.

Samuel Usher.

Hannah Usher.[2]

Census, 1841

Age 30 Birth Year (Estimated) 1807-1811 Birthplace Yorkshire Residence South Gate Hessle, Yorkshire East Riding living with wife Hannah Age 30 Birth Year (Estimated) 1807-1811 Birthplace Yorkshire and 4 children Bessey Usher Age 9 Birth Year (Estimated) 1832 Birthplace Yorkshire George Usher Age 7 Birth Year (Estimated) 1834 Birthplace Yorkshire Hannah Usher Age 3 Birth Year (Estimated) 1838 Birthplace Yorkshire and infant Emma Usher [3]

Census, 1851

Age 44 Birth Year (Estimated) 1807 Birthplace Hull, Residence East Gate Hessle, Stone Quarry Labourer living with wife Hannah Age 43 Birth Year (Estimated) 1808 Birthplace Anlaby, Yorkshire and 3 Children Emma Usher Age 7 Birth Year (Estimated) 1844 Birthplace Hessle, Samuel Usher Age 3 Birth Year (Estimated) 1848 Birthplace Hessle and Mary Jane Usher Age 1 Birth Year (Estimated) 1850 Birthplace Hessle[4]

Census, 1861

Living at Swine Gate Hessle, Yorkshire Age 54 Quarry Labourer with wife Hannah aged 50 Birth Year (Estimated) 1811 Birthplace Anlaby, Yorkshire with 14 year old son Samuel a Servant and daughter Mary F Usher [5]

Census, 1871

Age 65 Birth Year (Estimated) 1806 Birthplace Hull Married Gardener living at Everthorpe, North Cave, Yorkshire (West Riding), England with wife Hannah Age 64 Birth Year (Estimated) 1807 Birthplace Asselby, Yorkshire and aduly child Mary Jane Usher Age 21 Birth Year (Estimated) 1850 Birthplace Hull, [6]

Census, 1881

Age 73 Birth Year (Estimated) 1808 Birthplace Hull, Married Grocer 3 Acres Of Land living at North Cave And Drewton With Everthorpe, Yorkshire,Yorkshire East Riding, England with wife Hannah Age 73 Birth Year (Estimated) 1808 Birthplace Asselby, Yorkshire,[7]

Died 1891 North Cave Drewton and Everthorp, Yorkshire, England.

Sources

↑ "England Births and Christenings, 1538-1975", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:J716-J2V : 18 September 2020), George Usher, 1808.

↑ "England Marriages, 1538–1973 ", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:NL7V-TVW : 13 March 2020), George Usher, 1830.

↑ "England and Wales Census, 1841", , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:MQP4-BW7 : Tue Dec 05 13:07:26 UTC 2023), Entry for George Usher and Hannah Usher, 1841.

↑ "England and Wales Census, 1851," , FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:SG12-QTL : 12 September 2019), Hannah Usher in household of George Usher, Hessle, Yorkshire,Yorkshire (East Riding), England; citing Hessle, Yorkshire,Yorkshire (East Riding), England, p. 18, from "1851 England, Scotland and Wales census," database and images, findmypast (http://www.findmypast.com : n.d.); citing PRO HO 107, The National Archives of the UK, Kew, Surrey.

↑ "England and Wales Census, 1861," , FamilySearch (https://www.familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:M7TR-MSM : 3 March 2021), George Usher, Hessle, Yorkshire East Riding, England, United Kingdom; from "1861 England, Scotland and Wales census," database and images, findmypast (http://www.findmypast.com : n.d.); citing PRO RG 9, The National Archives, Kew, Surrey.

↑ "England and Wales Census, 1871", database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:KZLT-PN5 : 25 June 2022), Hannah Usher in entry for George Usher, 1871.

↑ "England and Wales Census, 1881," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:Q27B-SLXP : 11 December 2017), Hannah Usher in household of George Usher, North Cave And Drewton With Everthorpe, Yorkshire,Yorkshire East Riding, England; from "1881 England, Scotland and Wales Census," database and images, findmypast (http://www.findmypast.com : n.d.); citing p. 4, Piece/Folio 4738/113, The National Archives, Kew, Surrey; FHL microfilm 101,775,326.
